name: Stack Overflow Dark Colors
additional_info:
3-Aug-2017
  • Updates to new header bar
28-Dec-2016
  • Fixes for question status panel and some items on profile page
5-Aug-2015
  • Fixes for job panel and some items on profile page
11-Mar-2015
  • Quick fix for logo displaying incorrectly on Google Chrome
21-Jan-2015
  • Quick fix for sidebar item advertising chat
16-Jan-2015
  • Fixes for things that have changed since last update
  • Styling to answer input area
27-Dec-2014
  • Darkened some thin borders that were bright
  • Fixes for some items in the top menu and things that occasionally appear in the sidebar
  • Various fixes
25-Jan-2014
  • Various fixes
17-Jan-2014
  • Better StackOverflow logo
  • Search page fixes
15-Jan-2014
  • Initial release
  • Some things I'd like to fix possibly coming later

discussions.name: Was always great, but needs an update now.
